statements: SELECT firmware_id, firmware_version, device_id, update_date, update_status FROM firmware_updates
SELECT update_date, firmware_version, firmware_id, device_id, update_status FROM firmware_updates
SELECT device_id, update_status, firmware_version, update_date, firmware_id FROM firmware_updates
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates WHERE firmware_version LIKE 'v1.%'
SELECT firmware_id, device_id, firmware_version, update_status FROM firmware_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC
SELECT firmware_id, device_id, firmware_version, update_date, update_status FROM firmware_updates WHERE device_id = 101;
SELECT firmware_id, firmware_version FROM firmware_updates WHERE firmware_version LIKE '%v2%';
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates WHERE update_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT firmware_id, firmware_version FROM firmware_updates ORDER BY firmware_version ASC;
SELECT firmware_version, COUNT(*) AS total_updates FROM firmware_updates GROUP BY firmware_version HAVING total_updates > 3;
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT device_id, update_version FROM firmware_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT patch_version FROM patch_management WHERE update_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates INNER JOIN patch_management ON firmware_updates.device_id = patch_management.device_id;
SELECT device_id, patch_version, patch_date FROM patch_management WHERE patch_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY patch_date;
SELECT id, device_id, update_version, update_date, status FROM firmware_updates WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT device_id, patch_version, patch_date FROM patch_management WHERE patch_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, device_id, update_version, status FROM firmware_updates WHERE update_version LIKE '%v1.%' AND status = 'success' ORDER BY device_id ASC;
SELECT device_id, patch_version, patch_date, update_status FROM patch_management WHERE patch_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY patch_date DESC;
SELECT id, device_id, update_date FROM firmware_updates WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND status IN ('success', 'pending') ORDER BY update_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates;
SELECT device_id, update_version, update_date FROM firmware_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT device_id, update_version, update_date FROM firmware_updates WHERE device_id = 2;
SELECT update_version, device_id FROM firmware_updates WHERE update_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, COUNT(update_version) as update_count FROM firmware_updates GROUP BY device_id ORDER BY update_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates WHERE update_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT device_name, firmware_version FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Smartphone' ORDER BY device_name DESC

SELECT firmware_updates.update_version, patch_management.patch_date FROM firmware_updates INNER JOIN patch_management ON firmware_updates.id = patch_management.update_id WHERE patch_management.patch_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT patch_description FROM patch_management WHERE patch_date < '2022-04-01' AND device_id = 3

SELECT devices.device_name, firmware_updates.update_date FROM devices LEFT JOIN firmware_updates ON devices.device_id = firmware_updates.device_id WHERE devices.device_type = 'Laptop' GROUP BY firmware_updates.update_date HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates;
SELECT device_id, update_version FROM firmware_updates WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM device_inventory ORDER BY last_update_date DESC;
SELECT device_name, firmware_version FROM device_inventory WHERE device_id = 3;
SELECT patch_version, patch_description FROM patch_management WHERE release_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates WHERE update_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_id, firmware_version FROM device_inventory WHERE device_name LIKE 'P%';
SELECT patch_id, patch_version, patch_description FROM patch_management ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT device_id, MAX(update_date) AS latest_update_date FROM firmware_updates GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT * FROM compliance_status WHERE compliance_status = 'Compliant' AND patch_id IN (SELECT patch_id FROM patch_management WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01');
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates;
SELECT device_id, update_version FROM firmware_updates WHERE status='pending';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices ORDER BY last_update_date DESC;
SELECT patch_version, description FROM patches WHERE release_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY patch_id ASC;
SELECT device_id, patch_id, applied_date FROM device_patches WHERE applied_date IS NOT NULL AND device_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM firmware_updates WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT device_id, update_version, update_date FROM firmware_updates WHERE update_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT device_name, device_type FROM devices ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT patch_version, release_date FROM patches WHERE release_date <= CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT device_id, device_name, log_type, description FROM devices JOIN compliance_logs ON devices.device_id = compliance_logs.device_id;
